import React from 'react' import './NewsCard.css' import newsImg from '../../Images/slideImages/news-slide-2.jpg' function NewsCard(props) { // const { title, url, urlToImage, author, description, publishedAt } = props.details; const { title, url, urlToImage, description } = props.details; return ( <>

{title ? title?.split(' ').slice(0, 5).join(' ') : 'Title'}...

{description ? description.split(' ').slice(0, 12).join(' ') : 'Description'}...

) } export default NewsCard; /* author : null content : "2.1 Mark Wood to Stirling" description : "Follow England vs Ireland" publishedAt : "2022-10-26T04:32:46Z" source : {id: null, name: 'Cricbuzz'} title : "England vs Ireland" url : "https://www.cricbuzz.com/cricket-commentary" urlToImage : "https://www.cricbuzz.com/cricket-commentary" */
